doc.previous: One particular weapon developed by the Soviet Union Fractional Orbital Bombardment System had a partial orbital trajectory and unlike most ICBMs its target could not be deduced from its orbital flight path It was decommissioned in compliance with arms control agreements which address the maximum range of ICBMs and prohibit orbital or fractional orbital weapons
doc.after: Russia the United States China and India are the only countries currently known to possess land based ICBMs Israel has also tested ICBMs but is not open about actual deployment 21 22  The United States currently operates 450 ICBMs in three USAF bases The only model deployed is LGM 30G Minuteman III
